name: Beach Volleyball (itch) (26k)
description:
This is a prototype for a beach volleyball game, made in about 2 weeks! 

Single player only, one game to 15 points.

I focused on building simplified controls, but read the 'How to Play' section to get an understanding of them before jumping in!

Would love to hear your feedback, especially if you're new to the sport or volleyball games in general! Is this something you'd want to play?

---

Known bugs/issues:

+ Sometimes your player will get locked in place. Should clear up by the next play!

+ The ball might do weird things when it goes under the net, but the outcome should be correct regardless.

+ Partners sometimes dive for balls instead of getting into position to set.

+ Blocking can be over-powered and make for a tough to beat AI.

---
